name: Stuffed Zucchini Bake
ingredients: 1 small onion, diced, 2 1/2 ounces or about 1/2 cup
1/2 cup fresh mushrooms, diced, 2 large or about 3 ounces
2 ounces freshly grated parmesan cheese, 1/2 cup

instructions.en: Cut zucchini in half lengthwise. Scoop out pulp, leaving 1/4 inch of flesh. Discard pulp. Place shells on greased, foil-lined baking sheet. Season with salt and pepper.
instructions.sk: Rozrežte cukety pozdĺžne na polovicu. Vyberte dužinu, nechajte 0,6 cm dužiny. Dužinu zahoďte. Položte šupky na vymastený, fóliou vyložený plech. Ochuťte soľou a korením.
instructions.ja: ズッキーニを縦半分に切ります。果肉を1/4インチ残して中身をくり抜きます。くり抜いた中身は捨てます。殻を油を塗ったアルミホイル敷きのベーキングシートに置きます。塩コショウで味付けします。

instructions.en: Brown ground beef, garlic, onion, and mushrooms in a skillet. Season with salt and pepper; drain fat.
instructions.sk: Opečte mleté mäso, cesnak, cibuľu a huby na panvici. Ochuťte soľou a korením; zlejte tuk.
instructions.ja: フライパンで挽肉、ニンニク、玉ねぎ、マッシュルームを炒めて茶色くします。塩コショウで味付けし、脂を切ります。

instructions.en: Fill zucchini shells with meat mixture.
instructions.ja: ズッキーニの殻に肉の混ぜ物を詰めます。

instructions.en: Cover with foil and bake at 350°F for 45 minutes or until zucchini is tender.
instructions.sk: Prikryte fóliou a pečte pri 175°C 45 minút alebo kým cuketa nezmäkne.
instructions.ja: アルミホイルで覆い、350°F（175°C）のオーブンで45分間、またはズッキーニが柔らかくなるまで焼きます。

instructions.en: Uncover, top with cheese and bake for about 10 minutes to melt the cheese.
instructions.sk: Odkryte, posypte syrom a pečte asi 10 minút, aby sa syr roztopil.
instructions.ja: アルミホイルを外し、チーズをのせてさらに10分ほど焼いてチーズを溶かします。

notes: Makes 8 servings. Freezing not recommended. *Carb count adjusted for 19 ounces of zucchini after removing pulp.
